text: Polly Alexandra Walker (born 19 May 1966) is a British actress. She has starred in the movies Enchanted April (1991), Patriot Games (1992), Sliver (1993), Restoration (1995), The Gambler (1997), and Savage Messiah (2002),Rome (2005–2007). She is also known for her roles in BBC One dramas Prisoners’ Wives (2012–2013), Line of Duty (2016, 2019) and Netflix Original period drama Bridgerton (2020-). ==References== Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:1966 births
title: Polly Walker
